detail_desc: Short pleated chiffon dress in a narrow cut at the top with a halter neck with a hook-and-eye fastener. Opening front and back, seam at the waist with narrow elasticated straps, a concealed zip in the side and flared skirt. Lined.
Shirt in study, checked cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Rounded hem.
Linen shirt with a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves with a tab and button and a rounded hem.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch twill with wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Balconette bra in lace and mesh with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape. Hook-and eye fastening at the back.
Lace bra with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Lace bra with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend containing glittery threads with long balloon sleeves with ribbing at the top and cuffs.
Long-sleeved, fine-knit top with a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved, fine-knit top with a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved, fine-knit top with a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Flats with pointed toes, wrapover sides and elastication at the heels. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Underwired lace bra with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back and no fastenings.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
V-neck T-shirt in cotton jersey with hard-worn details.
Cardigan in a soft fine merino wool knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft fine merino wool knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Cardigan in a soft fine merino wool knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Oversized shirt in washed denim with pearly press-studs down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke front and back, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and a rounded hem.
Oversized shirt in washed denim with pearly press-studs down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke front and back, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and a rounded hem.
Oversized shirt in washed denim with pearly press-studs down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke front and back, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and a rounded hem.
Oversized shirt in washed denim with pearly press-studs down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke front and back, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and a rounded hem.

Short dress in sturdy, patterned cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a decorative knot detail at the bust. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Lined at the front of the bodice.
Straight-cut jersey T-shirt in a linen and cotton blend.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in an airy knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in an airy knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted jumper in a rib-knit viscose blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Fine-knit cotton jumper with a V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck jumper in a soft, stocking-stitched knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
V-neck jumper in a soft, stocking-stitched knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Extended section at the hem in a contrasting colour weave.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft mohair blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted polo-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing with press-studs at the cuffs.
Fitted polo-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing with press-studs at the cuffs.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a stand-up collar and long sleeves with a wide flounce at the cuffs.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a stand-up collar and long sleeves with a wide flounce at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in thin cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.
Fine-knit, short-sleeved dress in a cotton blend containing glittery threads with a decorative bow at the neck.
Fine-knit, short-sleeved dress in a cotton blend containing glittery threads with a decorative bow at the neck.
Hat in a double layer of marled, cotton-blend jersey.
Double-layered hat in printed jersey.
Double-layered hat in printed jersey.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with a glow-in-the-dark print on the uppers and ribbed cuffs.

Windproof gloves in thermal fleece with reinforced palms, a hook and loop tab at the wrists, a strap at the top and reflective details.

Padded ski mittens in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reinforced palms, ribbed cuffs and a reflective detail on the uppers. Thinsulate™ lining.
Windproof gloves in thermal fleece with reinforced palms, a hook and loop tab on the front and loop at the top. Reflective details.

Padded ski mittens in star-print windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reinforced palms for a firmer grip. Imitation suede section at the thumbs, and ribbing and an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the top. Thinsulate™ lining.
Round-necked T-shirt in cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Playsuit in a viscose weave with long sleeves with a drawstring that ties at the cuffs. Deep opening at the back, button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs. Unlined.
T-shirt with a print motif and raw edges.

Jumper in a soft cotton knit with a lined hood and zip at the top that continues along the edges of the hood. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short kimono in a textured, crinkled viscose weave with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves, pompoms at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Sturdy, round, imitation leather shoulder bag with a quilted front. Zip at the top, one small inner compartment and a metal chain shoulder strap. Lined. Size 5x18.5 cm.
